paragraphs.1: I'm a web developer in Philadelphia, PA. I'm excited about building responsive and flexible websites, learning new technologies, and untangling problems.
paragraphs.2: Before learning web development, I taught music for over 10 years. As a teacher, I'm passionate about communicating clearly - this translates into building websites that are user-friendly and inituitive to use.

1.title: Terminal ASCII Art App
1.description: Turns any graphic into ASCII artaa which is displayed in the terminal.

2.title: Muhlenhaupt + Company Agency Website
2.description: Fully responsive website built on Wordpress CMS. Includes customizable template parts and a modular content system using Advanced Custom Fields.

3.title: Note-Taking App
3.description: Web application for creating notes and saving them in a user's local storage.
